title: iPhone 13 Series Launches in More Countries, Including South Korea and Thailand
content:
Apple's iPhone 13 series today went on sale in Malaysia, Mexico, South Korea, Thailand, and select other countries and regions. The devices can be purchased from select retailers, while online orders are set to begin arriving to customers.


The ‌iPhone 13‌ mini, ‌iPhone 13‌, iPhone 13 Pro, and ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌ Max first launched on September 24 in the United States and more than 30 other countries and regions.

Key features across the ‌iPhone 13‌ lineup include a faster A15 Bionic chip, camera improvements, longer battery life, and a smaller notch. The two Pro models also feature a ProMotion display with a variable refresh rate up to 120Hz.
Related Roundups: iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Pro
Tags: Thailand, Mexico, Malaysia, South Korea
Buyer's Guide: iPhone 13 (Buy Now), iPhone 13 Pro (Buy Now)
Related Forum: iPhone
